column1: william ""bill"" ""coach"" neal andrews| william ""bill"" ""coach"" andrews was born december 17
column5: oklahoma. bill was one of five children born to william and edna andrews. after high school bill joined the united states marine corps and proudly served his country. bill was cattleman when he was younger and was known for being a great calf wrestler. bill will be dearly missed by everyone who knew and loved him. bill is survived by his spouse exa vernell andrews; brother
column6: jack andrews and his wife donna; niece
column7: jacqueline hamilton-taylor and her husband william; special friends bob and mildred tally and numerous other family members and friends. there will be a visitation monday
column9: 2015 from 4-6 p. m. funeral service will be tuesday
column11: 2015 at 10:00 a. m. upcoming events. visitationjun 15. 4:00 pm - 6:00 pm floral haven funeral home6500 south 129th east avenue. broken arrow
